timeline.message:
Update docs to include new archetype

Update docs to include new archetype `camel-archetype-endpointdsl`.

timeline.bodyText:
Its better to extend EndpointRouteBuilder, then you dont need those static imports, see for example 
  
    
      camel/core/camel-endpointdsl/src/test/java/org/apache/camel/builder/endpoint/FileDelayTest.java
    
    
         Line 50
      in
      4ea9e6c
    
    
    
    

        
          
           return new EndpointRouteBuilder() {
